titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to require the allocation of surface transportation program funds for the purchase of recycled materials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/19/2003--Introduced. Requires that ten percent of the funds apportioned to a State under the surface transportation program for a fiscal year be available for the purchase of recycled materials.
